mapper.insert: insert into hms_mem( email, pwd, name, tel, nick, intro, inter, hob) values(#{email},sha2(#{password},256),#{name},#{tel},#{nickName},#{interest},#{introduce},#{hobby})
mapper.select: select m.member_id, m.email, m.name, m.nick, m.tel, m.intro, m.inter, m.hob, mf.memberfile_id, mf.filepath, mf.origin_filename, mf.mime_type, m.created_date, b.writer from hms_mem m join hms_mem_file mf on m.member_id = mf.member_id join hms_gall b on mf.member_id = b.writer order by mf.memberfile_id desc
select member_id, email, pwd, name, nick, tel, intro, inter, hob, created_date from hms_mem order by member_id

select member_id, email, name, nick, tel, intro, inter, hob, created_date from hms_mem
where email = #{email} and pwd = sha2(#{password},256)
select member_id, email, name, nick, tel, intro, inter, hob, created_date from hms_mem where email = #{email}

select m.member_id, m.email, m.name, m.nick, m.tel, m.intro, m.inter, m.hob, mf.memberfile_id, mf.filepath, mf.origin_filename, mf.mime_type, m.created_date from hms_mem m left outer join hms_mem_file mf on m.member_id = mf.member_id where m.member_id=#{no} order by mf.memberfile_id desc
mapper.update: update hms_mem set name=#{name}, nick=#{nickName}, intro=#{introduce}, inter=#{interest}, hob=#{hobby} where member_id=#{no}
